code: import axios from"axios";const API=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:5000/api"});export default API;export const getProfile=()=>API.get("/profile");export const getProjects=function(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return API.get("/projects",{params});};export const getProjectById=id=>API.get("/projects/".concat(id));export const getSkills=function(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return API.get("/skills",{params});};export const getSkillCategories=()=>API.get("/skills/categories");export const searchAll=query=>API.get("/search",{params:{q:query}});export const searchProjectsBySkill=skill=>API.get("/search/projects",{params:{skill}});
